## Instructions
### Blizzard WoW (Classic and TBC)
- Download the **Blizzard Classic Addon** and **Vanilla Sounds** zips and extract them to your Addons folder.

### 1.12 (Private Vanilla Servers & Turtle)
- Download the **1.12 Addon** and **Vanilla Sounds** zips and extract them to your Addons folder.

### 2.4.3 (Private TBC Servers)
- Download the **2.4.3 Addon** and **Vanilla Sounds** zips and extract them to your Addons folder.

### 3.3.5 (Private WotLK Servers)
- Download the **3.3.5 Addon** and **Vanilla Sounds** zips and extract them to your Addons folder.
